query.statement:
SELECT AP01.DOCNO , AP01.CRIRUM , AP02.APNUM , AP02.APIRUM , AP02.APDATE , AP02.APTIM , AP02.APDPT1_N , CASE WHEN AP02.APPGUBN = 'S' THEN '기안' ELSE '수신' END APPGUBN , AP02.SEQNO , AP02.SEQSTAT
FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 AS AP01 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 AS AP02 ON AP01.MANDT = AP02.MANDT AND AP01.DOCNO = AP02.DOCNO
WHERE AP01.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND AP01.DOCNO = #DOCNO#
WITH UR
